step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you lift.
Great job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Excellent hold! Your shoulders and elbows are well-positioned.
You're returning to the start position effectively. Be mindful of keeping your wrists aligned as you lower your hands.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straight and elbows close when lifting your hands. This helps open up your chest and shoulders effectively.
